turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about List of Puerto Rican scientists and inventors.
turn.1: What is the history of science in Puerto Rico?
turn.2: List of Puerto Rican scientists and inventors  Before Christopher Columbus and the Spanish Conquistadors landed on the island of "Borikén" (Puerto Rico), the Tainos who inhabited the island depended on their astronomical observations for the cultivation of their crops.
turn.3: What did Ponce de León II accomplish?
turn.4: In 1581, Juan Ponce de León II, the grandson of the Conquistador Juan Ponce de León, studied an eclipse and its effects on the island and was able to establish the exact geographical coordinates of San Juan with his observations.
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: During the 19th century the economies of many countries in the world suffered from the spread of crop failures.
turn.7: Did Puerto Rico experience any of these failures?
turn.8: Puerto Rico, whose economy depended heavily on its agriculture, felt the effects of some of the crop diseases.
turn.9: Did they have any scientists or inventors to blame for the failures?
turn.10: Scientists such as Dr. Agustín Stahl, Fermín Tangüis and Fernando López Tuero conducted investigations and experiments in the fields of agriculture, botany, ethnology and zoology.
turn.11: Did the island ever recover from the failures?
turn.12: The findings of their investigations helped Puerto Rico's agricultural industry.
